meanings.definition: A device used to measure the density of small areas on a photographic film or plate.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used microdensitometers to analyze the film's density.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician calibrated the microdensitometers before starting the experiment.
meanings.sent3: When the microdensitometers went on strike, the researchers had to resort to manual measurements.
meanings.sent4: The microdensitometers acted like tiny detectives, uncovering the secrets hidden in the film's density.
meanings.sent5: The precision of the microdensitometers revealed the intricate details of the photograph.
